author: Tim Marcin
title: Coronavirus cooking is like a messed-up version of 'Chopped'
description: Last week, I was making dinner for my fiancée and me. I had thawed two pieces of chicken. That much was decided. From there, the dish was a mystery. I looked around the kitchen and shrugged. Soon enough, I'd have to venture back out into the world to gather m…
content:
Last week, I was making dinner for my fiancée and me. I had thawed two pieces of chicken. That much was decided. 
From there, the dish was a mystery. I looked around the kitchen and shrugged. Soon enough, I'd have to venture back out into the world to gather… [+3903 chars]
